summary: Several adventurers - cruel and cunning, virtuous and brave - sets off on a quest for the Golden Key - a metaphor of happiness.
cast: Dmitriy Iosifov|Tatyana Protsenko|Roman Stolkarts|Thomas Augustinas|Grigori Svetlorusov|Nikolay Grinko|Yuriy Katin-Yartsev|Rina Zelyonaya|Vladimir Etush|Rolan Bykov|Elena Sanaeva|Vladimir Basov|Baadur Tsuladze
title: Priklyucheniya Buratino
